channel.title: Dashboard on vCROCS
channel.description: Recent content in Dashboard on vCROCS

item.title: How vRealize Operations can help with Right Sizing VMs
item.description: Using vROPS Data to help show APP Owners Proper VM Sizing: vRealize Operations does a good job to show you what the correct number for vCPU/Memory settings should be based on monitoring history.

item.title: Creating Charts with ChartJS and displaying in vRealize Operations
item.description: I like the idea of using VMware vRealize Operations as the “Single Pane of Glass” for all monitoring. The Citrix Team recently asked me if I could show license usage within vRealize Operations.
